import React from 'react' import './Products.css' import { Product } from '../../model/Product' import { useState } from 'react' export interface Props { onDelete: (idProduct:string) => void onShowInfo:(product:Product)=> void product: Product; }; export function ProductItem(props:Props) { //filter, map, find,foreach, some,every return (
props.onShowInfo(props.product)}>

{props.product.name}

1500$ {props.product.price}$
) }
